data.title: List of Railway Stations in Haryana with Codes
data.meta_description: Railway stations in Haryana. List with Names of Haryana Railway stations. Haryana railway station codes. Haryana Train station names.
data.text:
Find railway stations and railway station codes in Haryana from this complete list of Haryana train stations. There are 211 railway stations in Haryana. The 5 main Haryana railway stations are Ambala Cantonment, Sonipat, Palwal, Hisar, Gurgaon.

Train Stations and Station Code of Haryana

Name and code of railway stations in Haryana is listed below. Important and main railway stations are in blue colour. For information about other train stations in Haryana, use the search box given below this list.

Haryana Railway Stations at a Glance

Number of railway stations in Haryana - 211

Main Haryana stations - UMB/Ambala Cantonment, SNP/Sonipat, PWL/Palwal, HSR/Hisar, GGN/Gurgaon.

Railway junctions in Haryana - 8

Cleanest railway station in Haryana (with rank) - Bhiwani (78), Ambala Cantonment (89), Gurgaon (94).

Number of stations with WiFi connectivity in Haryana - 120

Number of interstate trains reaching Haryana - 120

Railway zones and divisions in Haryana - North Central Railway (Agra - 4 stations), Northern Railway (Ambala - 20 stations & Delhi - 119 stations) and North Western Railway (Ajmer - 1 station, Bikaner - 57 stations & Jaipur - 10 stations)

Given below are the links to state wise list of indian railway stations.
